attributes.action: add to all election ballot papers the option of "None of the Above"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish to propse that all election ballot papers have the additional option of "None of the Above".
When participating in an election though many people feel it important to participate in the democrate process they often do not want to vote for any of the candidates avaliable. The only choice is to fill out the ballot paper incorrectly to make it void. This is then reported as a spoilt ballot paper and not as a rejection of the candidates.
It is important in a democratic society that we have the right not to vote for any of the candidates.
Maybe then all political parties would see how discontent the general populace are with them by the number of "None of the Above " votes that are cast.
This will enable many people to still execute their democratic rights without having to elect a person they do not feel is worth of the job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
